segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should really turn off the faucet and clean up the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children trying to get cookies from the jar, completely unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the water has been overflowing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated watching the woman ignore the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is waiting for her share, looking up at him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the water will cause any damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the outside through the window, looking so calm and tidy compared to the inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really do something about this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR
